release_note: Fixed an issue where dialogs would appear in the wrong size
Fixed an issue where the settings dialog has the wrong size
New straight line and shape recognizer tool
By popular request there s a new Export button in the Editor Options. Use it to export the current page as an image or all pages as a PDF file.
Bug fixes: Disable the video speed settings on devices that don t support it such as the iPad 2 preventing an error situation.

Video Speed Settings: You can now speed up the video in the editor before exporting it. This doesn t affect the original recording. Color Separation: Select individual colors making it easy to separate lines from a background. Pencil only drawing mode: Toggle on to rest your hand on the screen with impunity. Improved palm rejection when using the Apple Pencil.
You can now add text directly on your pages via the Add menu without having to import a PDF. Great for labels and descriptions. Tap on selected text then tap Edit to edit them.
Fixed a drawing offset issue on iPad Pro.

Vittle now supports the iPad Pro s native screen resolution and the Apple Pencil. By popular request you can now set the background color to whatever you want. The palette has also been expanded to include colors that look great on dark backgrounds. Enjoy! The App Makers Qrayon.
Select All no longer selects locked images.
Vittle now records widescreen non letterboxed videos by default. Improved Image Picker.

Added Wrist Guard Vittle now produces even higher quality output videos! It now records in 1080p HD by default. PDF and picture resolution are also doubled on retina devices. This makes everything sharper and easier to read for your audience.
Add support for the iPad Air 2 which adds a whole new world of performance!
Fixed a crashing bug in the Share menu. Movies are now recorded with a fixed frame rate which addresses occasional timing issues when encoding on sites such as Vimeo.
v2.6 adds support for iOS8. Also with support for transparent PNGs. Add transparent PNGs to your camera roll then import them into Vittle. Great for overlays and characters.
Bug fixes and improvements: Addressed an issue where rapidly pausing unpausing can cause the audio to drift out of sync. Improved video preview performance.
Minor bug fixes.
Updated for iOS7. Fixed an issue where tapping too quickly on the Stop and Rec buttons could result in a bad state.
Fixed an issue on iOS7 where certain scene compositions can result in audio sync issues.
Fixed a bug where certain multiple scene videos would fail to be generated under iOS7.
Fixed a bug when importing PDF files that have unsupported characters in their names.
Check for Mic Permissions in iOS7. Please make sure this is turned on in Settings Privacy. Mic permissions are required to record. If you wish to mute the mic you can do so from the Info menu.

Improved video generation performance when there are mixed muted and un muted scenes on iOS7. Muted scenes recorded on older versions may cause video generation to be slow on iOS7. Re recording muted scenes should remedy that.
Fixes for issues running on iOS7: Fixed a crash when recording if Microphone permission was not granted. Fixed a bug where audio could get out of sync if there are muted scenes.
Bug Fix: Screen may appear momentarily blank when drawing after dismissing Viewer on iOS7
Fixed a bug copying and pasting images from Inkflow to Vittle.

v1.3 comes with a shiny new App icon. The Dancing Dot effect is now turned off by default. You can turn it on from the editor options menu. If you like Vittle please rate us in the App Store. Each version gets a separate rating. Thanks!
Fixed audio and video sync issues.
Performance improvements and control refinement.
